---
title: "Installing tMAVEN"
---

# New Python Environment
Consider making a separate conda enviroment for tMAVEN

# Install package

* Navigate to the tMAVEN repository at <https://github.com/GonzalezBiophysicsLab/tmaven>, and clone the repository.
* Open terminal navigate to the tMAVEN folder
* To install this package, run
``` bash
pip install
```
* To open tMAVEN, run
```bash
tmaven
```
